typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GetRawData
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GetCountryCodes
GetRawData select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		value,
		source,
		each(match(name=='date'),
			'reported_' + $$ = $$),
		each(match(name=='year_week'),
			'reported_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredColumsn
